Package bomberman.controller.handler

Class GameStartHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.controller.handler.GameStartHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandlerI
    public class GameStartHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements HandlerI
    Starts the game when Command.START_GAME is passed to Controller.handle(Command).
    Author:
    Felix Bachmann
